metadata.dc:author: Fernández-Díaz, M L
Castiñeiras, I
Rey-Sanjurjo, J L
Rodríguez-Lojo, R
metadata.dc:description: Cutaneous metastases of prostate cancer are extremely rare. We present 2 cases of distant cutaneous metastases at atypical locations of prostate adenocarcinoma, and highlight the value of 2 immunohistochemical stains-prostatic acid phosphatase and prostate-specific membrane antigen-that can aid diagnosis, particularly in cases with negative staining for prostate-specific antigen.

Prostein

metadata.dc:title: Metástasis cutáneas a distancia de cáncer de próstata: 2 casos.
Distant Cutaneous Metastases of Prostate Cancer: A Report of 2 Cases.
